hero.title: Full Stack Developer and Computer Engineering Student
hero.subtitle: With a deep interest in video game development and cybersecurity.

about.title: About me
about.content: I am Computer Engineering student at the University of La Frontera, with a strong passion for learning and solving problems through technology. I currently excel as a Full Stack Developer. While I don't yet have hands-on experience in video game development or cybersecurity, I am independently exploring these fields through courses, personal projects, and reading technical documentation.
about.high-ligt-content: I am a curious and committed learner. I enjoy working in teams, sharing ideas, and tackling technical challenges that help me grow as a professional.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.description: Here are some of the projects I have worked on.

pokedex.description: A POC mobile application that displays a list of Pok√©mon using the PokeAPI.

malwareLab.description: A malware analysis lab designed to identify and mitigate cyber threats.

cityDashboard.title: City Scope Dashboard
cityDashboard.description: Dashboard for the ReplicaCity Temuco platform, visualizing real-time urban mobility data.

bunnyHunt.title: Bunny Hunt
bunnyHunt.description: A proof-of-concept video game created using PhaserJS.

contact.title: Contact me
contact.content: Feel free to reach out for collaborations, job opportunities, or just a friendly chat.
